meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4476.

td.p: Jennifer Wu, a sophomore from Arkadelphia, Arkansas
Zach Schoepflin, a sophomore from Centerport, New York
Emily Birkel, a junior from Indianapolis, Indiana

tr.td: GEOGRAPHY
SPORTS TALK
DO YOU SPEAK COMPUTER?
HEALTH MATTERS
OVER A FOOT LONG
STUPID ANSWERS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And he has a smile very similar to his great-grandfather.)
...
(Alex: [To Emily] Yes, the 100th anniversary of the teddy bear.)
...
(Alex: [To Jennifer] Oh, she\'s got a little happy face at the bottom.)
EmilyWho is Teddy Roosevelt?
$1,000
ZachWho is Teddy Roosevelt?
$1,200
JenniferWho is Teddy Roosevelt? :)
$7,601
Teddy Roosevelt')
